author: MSNBC
title: Woman beat with a hammer in NYC subway attack, police say
description: A woman was viciously attacked Thursday night at a New York City subway station when a man approached her from behind and beat her with a hammer, police said.
content:
A woman was viciously attacked Thursday night at a New York City subway station when a man approached her from behind and beat her with a hammer, police said.
